document.title: Adding a library
document.paragraph:
A dialog window has been designed to help you to add a library to your project.
/images/eiffelstudio/dialogs_and_wizards/new_library_dialog.png
There are two ways to make this window appear. You can:
Click
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_new_library_small_color.png in the
/tools/eiffelstudio/reference/10_browsing_tools/20_cluster_tool/00_introduction.xml Cluster tool .
Select Add library in the Tools menu.
Using this dialog, you can either choose a library from a list or select your own library.
